title: Epic 38: AI Staff Training Agent
description: AI-powered staff training system with interactive video practice sessions, real-time feedback, onboarding workflows, script training, compliance education, and performance coaching. Staff practice customer interactions with AI over video to develop skills.

userStories.title: AI training agent schema
userStories.description: Create database models for AI-powered training.
acceptanceCriteria: TrainingModule model with name, type, content, duration, requiredFor
TrainingProgress model with userId, moduleId, status, score, completedDate
PracticeSession model with userId, scenarioId, recordingUrl, feedback, score
TrainingScenario model with name, type, script, expectedOutcomes
StaffCertification model with userId, certType, earnedDate, expirationDate
PerformanceFeedback model with sessionId, category, feedback, suggestions

userStories.title: Video practice sessions
userStories.description: Interactive video sessions where staff practice with AI customer service scenarios.
acceptanceCriteria: AI plays role of patient/caller in video
Various scenario types (scheduling, billing questions, complaints)
AI follows scripted scenarios with variations

userStories.title: Real-time practice feedback
userStories.description: AI provides feedback during and after practice sessions.
acceptanceCriteria: Highlight strengths and areas for improvement

userStories.title: Onboarding workflows
userStories.description: Automated new employee onboarding with AI guidance.

userStories.title: Script training and practice
userStories.description: Train staff on phone scripts and patient communication.

userStories.title: Performance coaching
userStories.description: AI provides ongoing performance coaching based on real interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: aiTraining.coachFromCall - Analyze real calls for coaching
Identify coaching opportunities from actual patient interactions

userStories.title: Training dashboard
userStories.description: Dashboard for training management and progress.
